AT.name: Sonic the Hedgehog™: Triple Trouble
AT.description: Als der böse Wissenschaftler Dr. Robotnik gerade dabei ist, seine ultimative, zerstörerische Waffe zu testen, passiert einem seiner Assistenten ein kleines Missgeschick ... Das gesamte Labor fliegt in die Luft und fünf Chaos Emeralds werden quer über den Planeten Mobius verstreut. Sonic und Tails sprinten sofort los, um sie zu retten, mit Tricky Knuckles und dem langfingrigen Nack the Weasel dicht auf den Fersen. Wer erreicht die Chaos Emeralds zuerst? - Dreifache Action und dreifacher Trubel! Durchquere sechs Zonen, fünf Bonusrunden und ein wildes 3D-Level mit Loopings, explosionsartiger Geschwindigkeit und Superwirbel-Sprints! - Erlebe Sonics coole Moves! Schlag mit dem Strike Dash zu, fahr mit dem Jet Board auf Schnee und Eis, steh Kopf im Wirbel-Wagen und schwimm durchs Wasser mit Propellerschuhen. - Tauche mit Tails‘ U-Boot Sea Fox in die Tiefsee und erkunde mit Heli-Tails Gebiete, die für Sonic unerreichbar sind.

AU.name: Sonic the Hedgehog™: Triple Trouble
AU.description: While the evil genius Dr. Robotnik is testing the ultimate destructive weapon, one of his assistants makes a mistake, causing his lab to explode and scattering five Chaos Emeralds across the planet Mobius. Sonic and Tails spin-dash to rescue them. Tricky Knuckles streaks right behind, with sticky-fingered Nack the Weasel joining the hunt. It's a triple-threat race to see who will get the Emeralds first! -Three times the action and Triple the Trouble! Loop, blast and super spin-dash through six zones, five bonus rounds and a wild 3-D stage. -Check out Sonic's moves as he jams with his awesome Strike Dash, Jet-Boards on snow and ice, rolls in his Spin-Coaster and swims deep underwater with Propeller Shoes. -Help Tails as he submarines through water with his Sea Fox and Heli-Tails to explore parts of the zone beyond Sonic's reach.

CY.name: Sonic the Hedgehog™: Triple Trouble
CY.description: While the evil genius Dr. Robotnik is testing the ultimate destructive weapon, one of his assistants makes a mistake, causing his lab to explode and scattering five Chaos Emeralds across the planet Mobius. Sonic and Tails spin-dash to rescue them. Tricky Knuckles streaks right behind, with sticky-fingered Nack the Weasel joining the hunt. It's a triple-threat race to see who will get the Emeralds first! -Three times the action and Triple the Trouble! Loop, blast and super spin-dash through six zones, five bonus rounds and a wild 3-D stage. -Check out Sonic's moves as he jams with his awesome Strike Dash, Jet-Boards on snow and ice, rolls in his Spin-Coaster and swims deep underwater with Propeller Shoes. -Help Tails as he submarines through water with his Sea Fox and Heli-Tails to explore parts of the zone beyond Sonic's reach.

BE.name: Sonic the Hedgehog™: Triple Trouble
BE.description: Après l’explosion du laboratoire de l’infâme Dr. Robotnik suite à une erreur d’un de ses assistants, cinq Chaos Emeralds se trouvent alors dispersées à travers la planète Mobius. Sonic et Tails foncent pour retrouver les pierres sacrées. Knuckles se mettra alors en travers de leur route pour les en empêcher, talonné par cette fouine de Nack the Weasel. Les deux héros affronteront donc une triple menace pour savoir qui retrouvera les Emeralds en premier ! - Trois fois plus d’action et trois fois plus de difficultés ! Loopings, explosions et courses tourbillon vous permettront de virevolter à travers six zones, cinq étapes bonus et une étape 3D endiablée. - Admirez le style de Sonic qui enchaîne des attaques fulgurantes, dévale des pentes enneigées et glacées sur sa Jet-board, se retrouve la tête en bas dans les montagnes russes et nage en eaux profondes grâce à ses chaussures à hélices. - Aidez Tails à naviguer dans son sous-marin Sea Fox et sous sa forme Héli-Tails pour explorer les recoins de la zone, hors de portée de Sonic.

ES.name: Sonic the Hedgehog™: Triple Trouble
ES.description: El malvado Dr. Robotnik efectúa las últimas pruebas de su arma de destrucción definitiva cuando, por error, uno de sus ayudantes hace saltar el laboratorio por los aires y las cinco Chaos Emeralds se pierden en el planeta Mobius. Sonic y Tails acuden veloces a por ellas, pero el astuto Knuckles les pisa los talones y ese ladronzuelo de Nack the Weasel se une a la búsqueda. ¡Una carrera vertiginosa para encontrar las Emeralds! - ¡Acción y problemas por triplicado! Corre por las seis zonas, las cinco rondas extras y una espectacular fase 3D acelerando en los bucles y haciendo increíbles torbellinos. - Alucina con los sensacionales movimientos de Sonic! Utiliza su golpe veloz, esquía sobre nieve o hielo con la tabla a propulsión, monta en la carretilla deslizante y zambúllete con los zapatos a propulsión. - Lleva el Sea Fox de Tails bajo el agua y usa su movimiento Heli-Tails para acceder a lugares a los que Sonic no puede llegar.

IT.name: Sonic the Hedgehog™: Triple Trouble
IT.description: Mentre quel genio malefico di Dr. Robotnik è impegnato a provare la sua ultima arma letale, uno dei suoi assistenti commette un errore e causa l’esplosione del laboratorio, in seguito alla quale cinque Chaos Emerald vengono dispersi sul pianeta Mobius. Sonic e Tails si affrettano a cercarli. Il furbo Knuckles gli sta alle calcagna, e anche Nack the Weasel, quello con le mani sempre in pasta, decide di cercarli per conto suo. È una sfida tripla, nella quale bisogna battere tutti e mettere le mani sugli Emerald prima che lo facciano gli altri! - Sia l’azione che i guai sono tripli, qui! Volteggia, scatta e avvitati attraverso sei Zone, cinque Round bonus e una temibile Fase 3D. - Ammira la velocità di Sonic mentre esegue il suo Scatto Strike, sfreccia con lo Jet Board sulla neve e sul ghiaccio, guida il suo Spin Coaster e nuota sott’acqua con l’aiuto delle sue Pinne a propulsione. - Aiuta Tails a destreggiarsi sott’acqua con il suo sottomarino Sea Fox e a volare col suo Eli-Tails, per esplorare gli angoli della zona ai quali Sonic non può accedere.

NL.name: Sonic the Hedgehog™: Triple Trouble
NL.description: Terwijl het kwade genie Dr. Robotnik het ultieme en allesverwoestende wapen uittest, maakt een van zijn assistenten een fout waardoor zijn lab ontploft en vijf Chaos Emeralds over de planeet Mobius worden verspreid. Sonic en Tails zetten een wervelsprint in om ze te redden. De sluwe Knuckles zit ze op de hielen en ook de kleptomane Nack the Weasel doet mee aan de jacht. Dit is een race tussen drie partijen om te zien wie de Emeralds als eerste in handen krijgt! - Triple the Trouble: drie keer zo veel actie en drie keer zo veel problemen! Baan je met loopings en superwervelsprints een weg door zes zones, vijf bonusrondes en een wilde 3d-stage. - Zie die moves van Sonic! Hij baant zich een weg met zijn geweldige Strike Dash, jetboardt over sneeuw en ijs, rolt in zijn Spin-Coaster en zwemt diep onder water met propellerschoenen. - Help Tails door het water met zijn Sea Fox-onderzeeër en Heli-Tails om delen van de zone te verkennen die buiten het bereik van Sonic liggen.

GR.description: While the evil genius Dr. Robotnik is testing the ultimate destructive weapon, one of his assistants makes a mistake, causing his lab to explode and scattering five Chaos Emeralds across the planet Mobius. Sonic and Tails spin-dash to rescue them. Tricky Knuckles streaks right behind, with sticky-fingered Nack the Weasel joining the hunt. It's a triple-threat race to see who will get the Emeralds first! -Three times the action and Triple the Trouble! Loop, blast and super spin-dash through six zones, five bonus rounds and a wild 3-D stage. -Check out Sonic's moves as he jams with his awesome Strike Dash, Jet-Boards on snow and ice, rolls in his Spin-Coaster and swims deep underwater with Propeller Shoes. -Help Tails as he submarines through water with his Sea Fox and Heli-Tails to explore parts of the zone beyond Sonic's reach.

ZA.name: Sonic the Hedgehog™: Triple Trouble
ZA.description: While the evil genius Dr. Robotnik is testing the ultimate destructive weapon, one of his assistants makes a mistake, causing his lab to explode and scattering five Chaos Emeralds across the planet Mobius. Sonic and Tails spin-dash to rescue them. Tricky Knuckles streaks right behind, with sticky-fingered Nack the Weasel joining the hunt. It's a triple-threat race to see who will get the Emeralds first! -Three times the action and Triple the Trouble! Loop, blast and super spin-dash through six zones, five bonus rounds and a wild 3-D stage. -Check out Sonic's moves as he jams with his awesome Strike Dash, Jet-Boards on snow and ice, rolls in his Spin-Coaster and swims deep underwater with Propeller Shoes. -Help Tails as he submarines through water with his Sea Fox and Heli-Tails to explore parts of the zone beyond Sonic's reach.

PT.name: Sonic the Hedgehog™: Triple Trouble
PT.description: Enquanto o génio do mal, o Dr. Robotnik testa a sua mais recente arma de destruição, um dos seus assistentes engana-se e faz explodir o seu laboratório espalhando cinco Chaos Emeralds no planeta Mobius. Sonic e Tails apressam-se a salvá-lo. O manhoso Knuckles vem mesmo atrás, com Nack the Weasel de dedo espetado a juntar-se ao grupo. É uma corrida tripla para ver quem obtém as Emeralds primeiro! -Três vezes a acção e o triplo dos sarilhos! Gira, rebenta e faz super spin-dash em 6 zonas, 5 rondas bónus e um nível 3-D selvagem. -Vê os novos movimentos do Sonic enquanto ele dá baile com o seu Strike Dash, Jet-Boards na neve e no gelo, rola no seu Spin-Coaster e nada no fundo do oceano com os seus Sapatos Hélice. -Ajuda o Tails no fundo mar dentro do seu Sea Fox e Heli-Tails e explora partes da zona para além do alcance do Sonic.

RU.name: Sonic the Hedgehog™: Triple Trouble
RU.description: Пока злой гений Dr. Robotnik испытывает новое оружие массового поражения, один из его ассистентов допускает ошибку, которая приводит к взрыву в лаборатории. Из-за этого взрыва пять Chaos Emeralds разлетаются по всей планете Mobius. Sonic и Tails отправляются на их поиски. К охоте за камнями присоединяются Knuckles и Nack the Weasel. В этой гонке победит тот, кто доберется до изумрудов первым! -В три раза больше приключений - тройные неприятности! Пронеситесь через шесть различных зон, пять дополнительных раундов , а также по специальному 3D-уровню. -Смотрите, как движется Sonic, прыгая с помощью Strike Dash, используя Jet-Board на льду и снегу, крутясь в Spin-Coaster и плавая под водой с помощью пропеллерных ботинок! -Tails может добраться туда, куда не доплывет Sonic, с помощью Sea Fox и Heli-Tails!
